major_arcana.name: The Fool
major_arcana.description: Young, carefree person walking near a cliff's edge, carrying a small bag and a white rose, symbolizing purity and new beginnings
major_arcana.upright_meaning: New beginnings, interesting new adventure, potential for growth and unexpected opportunities, approaching life positively, childlike innocence
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: Recklessness, distraction, ignorance, potential risks and lack of awareness, not taking relationships or opportunities seriously

major_arcana.name: The Magician
major_arcana.description: Young man standing behind a table with four symbolic objects: wand, cup, sword, and pentacle, representing creative impulse with all possibilities and potential
major_arcana.upright_meaning: Skills, strategy, ability to influence the material world, individual's power inspired by the divine, new opportunities in career, love, and personal growth
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: Liar, fraudster, betrayer, lack of energy, immaturity, inability, potential deception and scattered energy

major_arcana.name: The High Priestess
major_arcana.description: Woman in flowing blue dress with white crown featuring lunar symbols, sitting between two pillars marked B (Boaz - strength) and J (Jachin - stability), holding scroll with TORA
major_arcana.upright_meaning: Secret knowledge and intuition, trust your intuition, potential secret love or unexpected happiness, hidden opportunities in career and personal life
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: Deception warnings, hidden problems in relationships, caution about trusting others blindly

major_arcana.name: The Empress
major_arcana.description: Woman on ornate throne with golden crown (12 stars), surrounded by wheat, water, and trees, representing fertility and abundance
major_arcana.upright_meaning: Pregnancy/new ideas, happiness, luck, love intensification, leadership, financial improvement, creativity and nurturing
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: Neglect, emotional barriers, unrecognized efforts, reckless spending warnings, creative blocks

major_arcana.name: The Emperor
major_arcana.description: Older man with white beard, golden crown, red clothing with armor, stone throne with ram's heads, representing authority and structure
major_arcana.upright_meaning: Authority, leadership, stability, career advancement, financial responsibility, paternal protection
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: Power abuse, controlling behavior, job dissatisfaction, financial instability, tyranny

major_arcana.name: The Hierophant
major_arcana.description: Figure with elaborate crown, holding triple cross, two apprentices before him, representing tradition and spiritual guidance
major_arcana.upright_meaning: Tradition, spiritual guidance, conservative approaches, career advancement, conformity, religious beliefs
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: Spiritual neglect, relationship stagnation, need for adaptation, rebellion against tradition

major_arcana.name: The Lovers
major_arcana.description: Two people facing each other, woman under apple tree with snake, man before tree with 12 flames, angel above representing unity and choice
major_arcana.upright_meaning: Unity, passion, harmony, important choices, growth opportunities, love relationships, partnerships
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: Emotional instability, communication breakdown, betrayal warnings, disharmony, bad choices

major_arcana.name: The Chariot
major_arcana.description: Charioteer standing above city, black and white sphinxes, canopy of stars, representing willpower and determination
major_arcana.upright_meaning: Victory, strong willpower, perseverance rewards, high energy, determination, control, triumph over obstacles
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: Lack of progress, diminished ambition, rash actions, need for patience, lack of direction

major_arcana.name: Strength
major_arcana.description: Woman calmly stroking lion, infinite symbol above head, control through compassion rather than force
major_arcana.upright_meaning: Courage, confidence, moral victory, leadership qualities, overcoming obstacles, inner strength, compassion
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: Self-doubt, relationship challenges, need for confidence building, weakness, lack of courage

major_arcana.name: The Hermit
major_arcana.description: Lone figure on mountain holding lantern and staff, symbolizing wisdom and solitude, inner guidance
major_arcana.upright_meaning: Self-reflection, personal journey, meditation, seeking deeper knowledge, inner wisdom, spiritual guidance
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: Excessive isolation, loneliness, overly self-critical, relationship disconnection, avoiding self-reflection

major_arcana.name: Wheel of Fortune
major_arcana.description: Wheel with TARO/YHWH letters, four evangelists in corners, sphinx, snake, Anubis, representing cycles and destiny
major_arcana.upright_meaning: Positive changes coming, fate and chance, improvements in all life areas, good luck, destiny
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: Chaotic energy, negative changes, relationship passion loss, financial risks, bad luck

major_arcana.name: Justice
major_arcana.description: Woman in red robe with crown, holding upward sword and golden scale, representing balance and fairness
major_arcana.upright_meaning: Truth, balance, fair judgment, positive legal outcomes, karma, accountability, justice
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: Dishonesty, avoiding responsibility, unethical behavior warnings, injustice, imbalance

major_arcana.name: The Hanged Man
major_arcana.description: Man hanging upside down from tree, halo around head, hands behind back, one foot bound, representing sacrifice and perspective
major_arcana.upright_meaning: Sacrifice, atonement, perspective change, waiting for right opportunity, suspension, letting go
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: Repeating mistakes, stalled progress, unwillingness to resolve issues, impatience, resistance

major_arcana.name: Death
major_arcana.description: Skeleton in armor on white horse, holding black flag, symbolizing transformation and endings leading to new beginnings
major_arcana.upright_meaning: New beginnings, life cycle changes, spiritual transformation, endings, rebirth, metamorphosis
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: Resistance to change, relationship challenges, feeling stuck, fear of change, stagnation

major_arcana.name: Temperance
major_arcana.description: Winged angel pouring liquid between two cups, symbolizing balance and moderation, harmony between opposites
major_arcana.upright_meaning: Patience, balance, self-control, harmony, career advancement, moderation, healing
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: Imbalance, excess, destructive behaviors, relationship conflicts, lack of patience

major_arcana.name: The Devil
major_arcana.description: Half-human, half-goat with bat wings, inverted pentagram, two bound human figures, representing temptation and bondage
major_arcana.upright_meaning: Temptation, earthly pleasures, materialistic ambitions, addictive behaviors, bondage, materialism
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: Freedom of consciousness, liberation from oppressive situations, breaking free from addiction

major_arcana.name: The Tower
major_arcana.description: Tower struck by lightning, people jumping from windows, 22 flames representing Major Arcana, sudden upheaval
major_arcana.upright_meaning: Sudden unexpected change, mental shock, necessary transformation, awakening, revelation
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: Impending crisis, inevitable transformation, relationship/career challenges, avoiding necessary change

major_arcana.name: The Star
major_arcana.description: Woman kneeling by pond, 7 small stars and 1 large star, pouring water from two pitchers, representing hope and inspiration
major_arcana.upright_meaning: Creativity, hope, optimism, good fortune, artistic pursuits, inspiration, spiritual guidance
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: Pessimistic outlook, professional unfulfillment, need to review budget, lack of faith

major_arcana.name: The Moon
major_arcana.description: Two towers, two dogs, crayfish emerging from pond, symbolizing duality of dreams/reality, illusion and intuition
major_arcana.upright_meaning: Hidden truths, illusion vs reality, potential mental health challenges, intuition, subconscious
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: Pain from deception subsiding, emotional stability, career improvements, clarity

major_arcana.name: The Sun
major_arcana.description: Child on white horse with outstretched arms, yellow flower wreath, four sunflowers, representing joy and success
major_arcana.upright_meaning: Hope, energy, optimism, self-confidence, success, vitality, joy, enlightenment
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: Blocked confidence, challenges in love/career/finance, reduced motivation, temporary setbacks

major_arcana.name: Judgement
major_arcana.description: Angel Gabriel awakening people from coffins, resurrection and final judgment imagery, representing rebirth and awakening
major_arcana.upright_meaning: Rebirth, choice, life transitions, clear vision, leadership, spiritual awakening, judgment
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: Indecisiveness, hesitation, missed opportunities, stagnation, self-doubt

major_arcana.name: The World
major_arcana.description: Woman floating between clouds, wrapped in cloth, holding white batons, green victory wreath, four corner symbols representing completion
major_arcana.upright_meaning: Perfection, success, achievement, completion, imminent victory, fulfillment, cosmic consciousness
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: Taking easy paths, relationship imbalances, self-imposed obstacles, incomplete goals

metadata.source: Major Arcana from Rider-Waite Tarot Deck
metadata.description: Complete Major Arcana tarot card descriptions with Korean translations, meanings, and symbolism
